description:
A train speeds toward Bananya and Baby Sweet! It`s all over! But just when all hope seems lost, the hero of justice, Bananya Man, appears! The duo find themselves entranced and decide to patrol the town, hoping to become heroes themselves. But then a menace from the skies threatens the peace...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hero Flies onto the Scene, Nya!
ヒーローがとんできた, にゃ!
